title: Shawl Fragment, 1901–25
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: Interlocking twill, free shuttle detail
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. G. Glen Gould
description: Kashmir shawl.  Horizontal repeats of symmetrical vase and flowers flanked by large elaborate interlace of decorated arabesques; twining flowering sprays fill interstices; scrolling floral guard band at bottom with decorated guard stripes above and below.  In bright turquoise, greens, purples, browns, cerises on pale tan ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Shawl Fragment, 1901–25.
1901–25. Medium: wool
Technique: Interlocking twill, free shuttle detail. Gift of Mr. and Mrs. G. Glen Gould. 1952-105-76.
